reviewText: We love watching Scott Hamilton's unique way of performing.  My son learned some of Scott's moves for his own figure skating programs.
This needs to be rereleased if someone is asking $400 for it.  Much as I love figure skating, I'm sure not going to pay that much (or anywhere near that much)!
Good skating dvd.  Lots of numbers I loved the first time that were fun to see a second time.

It's a very entertaining DVD to have to watch any time you're in the mood to sit
back and enjoy the talent of the skaters in this DVD.
